text:
Gary V. Staples (January 16, 1940 – January 2, 2021) was an American Republican politician. In 2004 he was elected as a member of the Mississippi House of Representatives. Before, he was a member from 1988 to 1992. He was born in Laurel, Mississippi.
Staples died on 2 January 2021 in Laurel from cancer, aged 80.
